ayas.translation: SINCE THE QURAISH have been united,

bismillah.translation: In the name of Allah, most benevolent, ever-merciful.

ayas.translation: United to fit out caravans winter and summer,
Let them worship the Lord of this House,

ayas.arabic: ٱلَّذِىٓ أَطْعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٍ وَءَامَنَهُم مِّنْ خَوْفٍۭ
ayas.translation: Who provided them against destitution and gave them security against fear.
ayas.transliteration: alladhī aṭ`amahum min jū`in wa-āmanahum min khawf
